price: "Ga* su yi sujada ga Allah Wanda Yake fitar da abin da yake a ɓõye, a cikin sammai da ƙasa, kuma Yã san abin da kuke ɓõyẽwada abin da kuke bayyanãwa."
arabic: أَلَّاۤ يَسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡخَبۡءَ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُخۡفُونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ
footnotes: * An kãyar da harafin kõrewa dõmin barinsa, da Hausa, yanã ɓãta ma'ana, dõmin shaiɗan bai kange su daga rashin yin sujada ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: allā yasjudū lillahi alladhī yukh'riju al-khaba-a fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wayaʿlamu mā tukh'fūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
